mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name0 AS "name0", a.name1 AS "name1", a.name2 AS "name2", a.name3 AS "name3", a.pv0 AS "pv0", a.pv1 AS "pv1", a.pv2 AS "pv2", a.pv3 AS "pv3", a.jion0 AS "jion0", a.jion1 AS "jion1", a.jion2 AS "jion2", a.jion3 AS "jion3", a.zhitui0 AS "zhitui0", a.zhitui1 AS "zhitui1", a.zhitui2 AS "zhitui2", a.zhitui3 AS "zhitui3", a.hezuo0 AS "hezuo0", a.hezuo1 AS "hezuo1", a.hezuo2 AS "hezuo2", a.hezuo3 AS "hezuo3", a.guanli0 AS "guanli0", a.guanli1 AS "guanli1", a.guanli2 AS "guanli2", a.guanli3 AS "guanli3", a.tuidian0 AS "tuidian0", a.tuidian1 AS "tuidian1", a.tuidian2 AS "tuidian2", a.tuidian3 AS "tuidian3", a.zhou0 AS "zhou0", a.zhou1 AS "zhou1", a.zhou2 AS "zhou2", a.zhou3 AS "zhou3", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_setting( id, name0, name1, name2, name3, pv0, pv1, pv2, pv3, jion0, jion1, jion2, jion3, zhitui0, zhitui1, zhitui2, zhitui3, hezuo0, hezuo1, hezuo2, hezuo3, guanli0, guanli1, guanli2, guanli3, tuidian0, tuidian1, tuidian2, tuidian3, zhou0, zhou1, zhou2, zhou3, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name0}, #{name1}, #{name2}, #{name3}, #{pv0}, #{pv1}, #{pv2}, #{pv3}, #{jion0}, #{jion1}, #{jion2}, #{jion3}, #{zhitui0}, #{zhitui1}, #{zhitui2}, #{zhitui3}, #{hezuo0}, #{hezuo1}, #{hezuo2}, #{hezuo3}, #{guanli0}, #{guanli1}, #{guanli2}, #{guanli3}, #{tuidian0}, #{tuidian1}, #{tuidian2}, #{tuidian3}, #{zhou0}, #{zhou1}, #{zhou2}, #{zhou3}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE member_setting SET name0 = #{name0}, name1 = #{name1}, name2 = #{name2}, name3 = #{name3}, pv0 = #{pv0}, pv1 = #{pv1}, pv2 = #{pv2}, pv3 = #{pv3}, jion0 = #{jion0}, jion1 = #{jion1}, jion2 = #{jion2}, jion3 = #{jion3}, zhitui0 = #{zhitui0}, zhitui1 = #{zhitui1}, zhitui2 = #{zhitui2}, zhitui3 = #{zhitui3}, hezuo0 = #{hezuo0}, hezuo1 = #{hezuo1}, hezuo2 = #{hezuo2}, hezuo3 = #{hezuo3}, guanli0 = #{guanli0}, guanli1 = #{guanli1}, guanli2 = #{guanli2}, guanli3 = #{guanli3}, tuidian0 = #{tuidian0}, tuidian1 = #{tuidian1}, tuidian2 = #{tuidian2}, tuidian3 = #{tuidian3}, zhou0 = #{zhou0}, zhou1 = #{zhou1}, zhou2 = #{zhou2}, zhou3 = #{zhou3}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
